title: Disconnecting Constantly
body: Every single game when i'm about to pick or ban I get disconnected from your client while I'm listening to music on youtube/spotify or even in a call with friends, so it's not my internet. 7/10 games today i've had someone who dc's at lvl 3 and never comes back causing me to lose due to 4v5. Can you guys please look into your servers as there is a serious problem going on.

replies.body:
I took a look at didn't find any server issues recorded lately. Even though you aren't experiencing drops from other sites and services doesn't necessarily mean that there isn't a network routing issue specifically to our server, since each server you access is located in a different geolocation. Before we take a deep look at your network routing, we'll need you to configure your network by following our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Please let me know if this resolved your issue.
